EmailTemplate.subject: Join me for drinks at Char in Raritan next week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Pivotal is coming off a great 2014 with our Agile development, Cloud Foundry, and Big Data Science offerings thriving. We've built a great foundation for the pharma industry and our plans for 2015 are sure to raise some eyebrows.
For a view into some of this excitement, please join me for great appetizers and drinks at Char in Raritan <http://charsteakhouse.com/> this Thursday, February 12. I'll be at the bar with one of Pivotal's best field engineers if you would like to talk technical.
Please shoot me a note if you plan on stopping by so I know how many stools to try and grab. Fun starts at 5:30.
Cheers,
Steve Schoenhaus Strategic Account Director (917) 763-5582 <tel:917-763-5582> sschoenhaus@pivotal.io <mailto:sschoenhaus@pivotal.io>
